scenario.title: Title: Will talks be recorded Narrative: As a parent I want to know where talk recordings will be stored so I can access the material if I miss it Acceptance Criteria: Scenario 1: Virtual open day webpage
scenario.step: Given that the desktop website is displayed
When I click on the "Virtual Open Day" option from the home page
Then I can see the talks that have already been recorded Scenario 2: Upcoming talks
Given that I have logged in to the mobile app
And the open day has finished
When I click on the "Talk Recordings" option from the home screen
Then I will be able to see recordings of talks I missed
